description.value: Much like morrignas, you feel an affinity for spiders. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Animal Messenger]{Animal Messenger}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Speak with Animals]{Speak with Animals}, and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Spider Climb]{Spider Climb} each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
